name: SmartyPants
0:
”Alexa open smarty pants”
”Alexa ask smarty pants for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smarty pants
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask for facts about Barbados Island.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Smarty Pants" or "Alexa, open Smarty Pants" to get a fact".

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
